title: fix: update gateway commit for Gemini executable_code blocks + reasoning_effort fix
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Gemini gets handy
gist.blurb: Gemini models now support native code execution and better reasoning on our text API.
gist.summary: Updated the Portkey gateway deployment to map Gemini's code execution blocks to OpenAI format and fix reasoning effort parameters.
gist.impact: Developers using Gemini via our API will see correct code execution results and improved handling of reasoning tasks.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee collaborating with a 'Gemini' entity (represented abstractly as twin stars or a dual-colored robot) to solve a code puzzle.
gist.image_prompt: Pixel art scene of the round yellow Pollinations bee mascot watching a holographic terminal where code blocks are assembling themselves. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The terminal displays a small pixelated twin-star icon with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
